resources.string: You can choose the character. Your choice:

The game is developed as coursework project of SPbAU second year bachelors. The source code of the program you can find here: https://github.com/avgaydashenko/Race Authors: Anastasia Gaydashenko, Alexandra Malysheva

The player has three lives. He loses one if he bumps into a barrier. Player can score points during the game, the best result is saved. Single player game: Player can choose a character to play. The game ends if the player runs out of lives. A game with a friend: To play with a friend you must connect to the device using Bluetooth. The game ends when one player runs out of life. He is a loser.
